body_content.explanation: a situation in which two or more people or things are separated:
examples: During the war many couples had to endure long periods of separation (= not being together).
After many years the South African government finally abandoned its apartheid system of racial separation.

body_content.explanation: an arrangement, often legal, by which two married people stop living together as a couple:
examples: Couples may agree to divorce each other after a separation.
They're considering separation as an option.
